item.description:
Duxbury Conservation Lands. 5 to 6 mile hike through Duxbury conservation lands including North Hill Marsh, Round Pond, Bay Circuit Trail and Audubon Sanctuary. Highlights include cranberry bogs, ponds, moderate hills and paths through forest cover.

Current weather forecast is for temperatures in the mid 50s

No dogs please since a significant part of this hike is over Audubon land where dogs are not allowed.

Leader Bill McDonald 508-942-3800 (Cell).

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Directions: Take exit 10 off Route 3. Go 1.8 miles on 3A North and turn left on Mayflower St. Go 1.2 miles to North Hill Marsh parking lot on right.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Hike North Hill Marsh Duxbury Conservation Lands - Last Minute
